其實以整體遊戲性來說，是好玩的，新手要有會被砍爆的心理準備
以下為我的評價

遊戲整體:8.2/10
還不錯，但希望能對倖存者更有利一點

緊張度:6/10
有些鬼很強，有時修一下發電機突然被砍，會被嚇到一下

系統設置:7.2/10
有時明明都要進入大廳了，結果遲遲不進，等的有點不耐煩，有時會Lag

遊戲細緻度:7.8/10
其實細緻度還不錯，值得嘉獎

價錢合理度:還算合理
建議特價再買，普通價格不太划算

如果你考虑入手黎明杀机，不妨先读读一个老玩家对这款游戏的感受！这是一款让你又爱又恨的游戏，首先对新手很不友好，屠夫比较容易上手，人类则需要长时间的练习才能变成人皇。其次这个游戏BUG奇多，各种意想不到的BUG，每次更新都会伴随而来新的BUG，而且制作组修复BUG也并不太积极。然后是平衡性，虽然是4V1的游戏，但是经过几次更新，可以说人类毫无还手之力，兔子姐姐和护士长的出现完全打破了现有的平衡，LT和4个1被削弱让即使人皇也在新屠夫面前毫无还手之力，  可以不客气的说  这个版本玩人类就是  为了让屠夫杀 让屠夫爽，所以现在屠夫需要很长时间才能排到人类。最后我要说一下制作组，我认为大部分人都是通过直播或者朋友了解到这款游戏的，我也是一个300小时的老玩家了，但是制作组基本都是按照国外主播的意见来改，因为合服之后，国外主播很难对抗国服人类，虽说是恐怖游戏，但是什么玩多了也就不恐怖了，如果平衡性不改回来，我想没有人会玩一个只会修电机，按QTE躲猫猫的游戏，溜屠夫的技术也是不知道死了多少次看了多少视频才学会的，制作组的一意孤行只会让萌新望而却步，老玩家心灰意冷。

Dieses Spiel bietet allein oder mit Freunden eine menge Spannung, Adrenalin und Spaß!
Das Spiel ist äußerst Empfelenswert weil das Gameplay zwar Schlicht gehalten ist aber in jeder neuen Runde als Überlebender sowie als Killer sehr Spannend gehalten ist.
Der Koop Modus mit Freunden zum Überleben ist von 2-4 Spielern gehalten, aber wenn man kein fremden Killer haben möchte kann man die ,,Töte deine Freunde'' Modus benutzen und mit 2-5 Spielern spielen.
Natürlich gibt es auch Nachteile wie das Matchranking (Level/Skill). Man muss damit Rechnen das ein Anfänger mit dem Überlebenslevel 20 (niedrig) in ein Match mit 12-16 (Mittel) hinein kommt. Aber es kommt auch natülich darauf an wie Hilfsbereit die anderen Mitspieler sind. 
Im Großen und Ganzen ist dieses Spiel ein Meisterwerk und kann einen dazu verleiten es alleine oder in einer Gruppe mit Freunden zu suchten.
Ich hoffe die Entwickler lösen noch das Ranking System, aber finde das Spiel dennoch ein Meisterwerk.

Let me start of by saying that I've never been rank 1 and have only experienced playing against or with rank 1 players a handfull of times. Also I mainly play killer so this review will be mostly from that perspective.

That being said this is a really good game.
It has great atmosphere and sound, lovely maps and a competitive feeling, whilst staying casual enough to mess around in with friends. No matter what you play, be it killer or survivor expect a few losses in the first game, because there is a small learning curve. At the moment of writing this review the game is relatively balanced and in a very playable state.
You'll have a lot of fun playing as either killer or survivor if you are lower rank.

However there are also some glaring problems with the game, namely the connection. Because the killer is always the host if your killer has a bad connection, everyone has a bad connection.
There is also the issue of survivors ragequitting when being hooked to keep their items which makes it harder for killers to rank up. At the moment of writing this review there is absolutly no reason, except for a little derank, to quit to keep your items.
But my biggest problem with the game is that balancing issues stay in game for way too long and it can take up to months for a single unbalanced issue to be resolved.

Still in it's current state I'd say this game is worth picking up, especially if you got some friends who play it.
很刺激的1v4 游戏，励志成为一个人皇哈哈哈

So the game is great. Unless you get 4 people on voice call that are working together. When they cram together and block you from walking down stairs, or unhook a person because you can't attack multiple times in a row (Fucking stupid btw, who can only swing a weapon once and then has to wait 3 seconds?) and they just crwd around and take one for the team, then heal each other fully again super fast and repeat.

There are some major issues here. First off, I get why they put in the delay in swings, so if hit once you might escape the second, but seriously. To fix this all you need to do is make it so they can never "Fully" heal, but still incorporate a way to move at full speed, i.e Adrenaline maybe. And this way it stops people from abusing such things. OR. You could hit multiple people with one swing? Would be quite realistic if you ask me, and then they can't group together and be wimps.

Secondly. Blocking the Killers way??? Seriously??? They added fucking collision?? At least give the Killer a way to push them out of the way without dropping the person you are carrying, or even attack without dropping them. It's not unrealistic or unfair.

The fact that these game devs didn't think of these things makes me feel like they are extremely new to games. Every game with collision gets abused. Every game with delays in the evil characters moves/attacks gets abused. How is this not common sense to test these and fix them? Or do the Devs not care? Was this just a money grab like every other game out there now?

All in all, needs a lot of work. And I would not recommend this game to those who get very angry quickly, because you will find these pansies who have to take advantage of technical issues, and you will lose your shit.

There are better games than this out there, and I suggest you play them and not waste your money on this.

Ok all in all the game is extremely fun. The feeling of getting caught by the killer or even just hearing the heartbeating knowing the killer is near by,hiding as fast as possible and spinning your camera around just to try and figure out where he is or coming from. The feeling of actually outsmarting the killer and losing them when the find you,or just plain escaping and winning the match is one of the best feelings any game has given me.

Sadly though as of right now, not sure if it is the newest update or what but now there is just a ton of bugs. Sometimes hard to even get to a lobby with others,sometimes hard to join a match. Even once I do join a match I simply lag horrificly. I really do hope they fix it soon cause it is a drag to try and survive when your glitching and lagging all over the map.

Ich habe dieses Spiel jetzt schon seit ungefähr 150 Stunden gespielt,
und spiele das Spiel nur weil ich es mit meinen Freunden spiele.

Das Spielprinzip finde ich sehr gelungen doch ich sehe nun nur noch die Geldgeilen Entwickler die sich dafür entscheiden,
keine ANTI Camp-Einrichtung zu implizieren. Schade. 

Nun das Spiel rettet sich auch nicht mit matschigen Texturen... man könnte soooo viel aus dieser Engine raushauen ... am Ende scheitert dies allerdings an der Texturierung.

Bugs und Glitches, Disconnects, rumlaggen weil der Killer irgend so ein Russe oder sonst jemand aus sonstwo mit ner 3k Leitung ist.

Auch die offensichtliche Geldgier der Entwickler mit ihren "Tollen" addons indenen die Killer anfangs total overpowerd sind und dann generved werden. 

Dieses Spiel bringt Spielspaß aber auch sehr viel Frustration. Auch schade ist, das kein Ingame Voicechatt verbaut worden ist. Es wäre dann einfacher zu komunizieren aber leider ist das nicht so....

Gute Idee wenig Arbeit invistiert ... schade mann könnte es soooo schön gestallten können.

I noticed people often compare this to Friday the 13th and vice versa, often both try to cut each game down, (as expected by fanboys or fangirls) there's nothing wrong with preference, but to bash another game is where I draw the line

DBD and F13 have only 2 similarites

1-They are both team focused horror games and is survivors vs a killer
2-Both involved some type of movie license (DBD  gets Michael Meyers as a cameo, which is close enough, and F13 is slef explanatory)

But that is where the similarities end, both may be horror games, but the way they play and the way they are structured make them two different ball games, and in my opinion, both games are great, but both have their flaws, I'm not hear to review two games in one, but hopefully to clear some people up and give DBD both some credit and constructive criticism where it is due

With that in mind, lets discuss the differences, as well as the pros and cons of DBD compared to F13, as well as a game as a whole


Gameplay

Survivors-You still have to work as a team, but this is more about being quick and efficiant while either being stealthy, clever, or outwitting the killer in order to survive, because you can't fight back, that's not to say that's a bad idea, it just plays differently, there is a stronger emphasis on needing to adapt to your situation and your environment compared to F13 due to smaller maps and a smaller team size as well as what means you are given to survive and "combat" the killer, but the way it plays makes me think "What would happen if Outlast was a multiplayer game and took place not ONLY at an asylum?" The game, even when you lose, makes you feel like you are getting closer and closer to being a better survivor, and even when you die, there are times where you can "go out" knowing that you contributed to helping everyone survive or that you came to their rescue. Even though the teamwork aspect is on a smaller scale, it's still teamwork nonetheless,the key is that it's executed differently

Killer-You get a multitude of killers to pick from to fit whatever play style you'd like and you need to focus on keep any eye on patrolling generators while also needing to make sure that you, again, know the placements of generators well while also not having tunnel vision to avoid other generators from getting fixed or letting other people escape and try to hook as many people as possible


Pros

Choice-One of DBD's big differences and one I actually strongly like is the ability to choose which side you want to be on (the killer or the survivors)

Character Customization-While I am not a fan of the one use aspect of add-ons (just personal preference) I do like the concepts of add ons and perks which allow you to essentially create your own "build" of a surivor (On that note, a character builder would be a nice bonus for the surivors)

 Character Variety and Backstory-I really like the variety and different playstyles of each of the different killers, my favorites being Michael Meyers and the Butcher, I also like the varied surivors and their backstories, everything from a science nut to Bill (awesome cameo) to a drunkard who was always picked on, these backstories make character less stale and give them more flavor and substance

Map Variety-This game in my opinion has more diverse and intriguing locations and is more varied compared to F13's maps, despite being smaller scale, its nice to have every neck of the woods as a playground, from a junkyard to an asylum to a hospital

Neutral-As expected, the main point that is neither good nor bad, but is more so annoying, is always finding arrogant players who mock you for not catching them or might be cheap and ditch you with an "every man for himself/herself" mentallity, but this is to be expected


Dislikes

No voice chat-One place where F13 shines and where this game BADLY needs an addition to in my opinion is voice chat, text chat while playing a game like this is too tedious and can leave you open, in a game where teamwork is key, (despite maybe not as much) the game would STRONGLY benefit from voice chat

No Single Player-Both F13 and DBD suffer from this, and this game I feel could STRONGLY benefit from single player campaings in order to further expand the backstories of the killers and surivors, 

Skill Checks-The concept of skill checks in itself is fine, but the issue is that the skill checks are activated by an audio cue, which honestly can at times blend in with the noise of the environment or the music/ambient noises of the game, or sometimes you are soo deeply imerged you don't notice them until its too late and you fuck up, exposing your location, I feel as though this is one of the RARE times where a QTE would actually make sense with a button combination popping up on the screen rather than a wheel with an audio cue


Conclusion

Dead by Daylight may be similar to Friday the 13th, but I feel as though this game is different enough to warrant being a different surival horror game all togheter and is a fun expereincce in itself, its also somewhat harder than F13 from both perspectives in my opinion (i.e. harder to win and unlock things/rank up) but the game is overall a fun experience and something you wouldn't want to miss out on if you are a horror game fan, team based game fan, or both

Quite a bit of fun with a few days between sessions as the gameplay tends to be repetitive as hell.

This game is an excellent asymetric 4v1 horror game with a problematic community. You can play as any of 8 killers (at this time) each distinict in appearance, speed and mechanics. There are also 8 playable survivor characters that are less varied, but like the killers have some unique perks to unlock that act as a signature playstyle and each survivor is unique in apperance. 
Controls and mechanics are simple and easy to learn, the survivors need to open the doors and escape, the killer needs to kill them all. Despite this, as this game is all online PvP there is a steep learning curve for new players that is ultimatly quite rewarding once you put the time in to learn. All matches are ranked, so your pefromance will dictate your ranking in every match, and your mechanics which dictate performance are different for survivors and killers (at this time). 

Now the bad. The community is flat-out terrible. Ultimatly there are two communities, depending on whether you prefer surivor or killer, and they hate each other with a passion. I would stay away from the discussion boards unless you are looking at announcements, much like you would stay away from YouTube comments. The anger and attitude is even on the reviews for this, as each side has play strategies that the other side feels is cheating, or is unfair. If you see references to "camping" or "looping" that is what I am refering to. The lobbies can be long, depending on the player make-up at that moment, some people will disconnect from games to try and screw the other side or avoid losing items. There are occasional bugs but the developers are constantly working on this game.

Ultimatly, this is a fun game. Give it some time to learn to play, ignore the rude folks and give it a go. You won't regret it.

Muito viciante. Jogar de assassino e de sobrevivente é como jogar dois jogos diferentes, então o jogo nunca cansa. Apesar de alguns reclamando de "campers", eles não são tão comuns. Um problema meio comum é o lag, mas não há nada que possa ser feito para melhorar esse aspecto (o assassino é o host da sala). O jogo (você perdeu!) tem vários personagens, várias "perks" para formar sua estratégia de fugir ou matar, e mapas únicos, havendo um lugar para cada asssassino. Recomendo.

very fun game, can play with friends as either a whole group of survivors and killer or randomly jump in on different games.
pros;
-good graphics
-good gameplay
-still given something even if you lose a match
-lots of replay value as each match is something new
cons;
-Controls are a little awkward until you get used to them
-have really no way to defend from killer, just run and hide
-certain characters(both survivor and killer) are a little unbalanced

Overall good game would definitely recommend for anyone into the cooperative/competitive type of game, and horror obviously

Игра хорошая? - Да, стоит брать? - Да.
Далее приведу примеры того, как зделать игру лучше.
1)Убрать обучающие перки! Нет смысла делать много персонажей не делая упор на их индивидуальсть ( относится как к выжившим, так и к убийцам ).
2)Убрать memento mori у убийц, у выживших убрать возможность открывать ключом запасной выход до запуска всех генераторов.
3)Если первый пункт выполнен, при выборе персонажей за выживших не должно быть одинаковых. Или чтобы подбор персонажей под каждую игру был рандомный ( так даже лучше ), но, опять же, без одинаковых.
4) ( Не обязательно ) Дать возможность каждому взять убер престиж. Как это зделать интереснее? После того как персонаж прокачан до 50 уровня 3 престижа, при очередном сбросе чтобы взять уровень надо купить за кровавые очки все умения, подношения и предметы в полной сетке прокачки персонажа ( как была при выходе игры ). Но это уже область фантастики и попахивает полным сбросом игры.
5)Убрать автоматическое прицеливание убийцы на выжившем во время удара и вернуть те времена когда мастерство убийцы решало ударить или промазать.
Это несомненно зделает игру лучше. Спасибо за внимание.

c'est très bon que je recommande au personne qui aime l'horreur et la survie, le gameplay est  original et intéressant comme dans chaque partie on peut joué le survivant ou le tueur. Les survivants doive s'échappé en ouvrant es portes de sortie à chaque game mais l'expérience peut varier car il y à la possibilité d'utiliser objet qui définisse notre manière de joué (utiliser les boîte à outil pour ce concentrer sur les générateur en les réparant plus vite). Mais le plus intéressant est de joué le tueur dans les partie car il y en à des différents et ils ont chacun des capacité qui leur sont unique (l'infirmière peut se téléporter, le piégeur peut poser des pièges se qui oblige à être stratégique en les posant à des endroits précis pour que les survivants tombe dedans). Le seul problème ce sont les développeurs qui devraient faire quelque chose contre les cancer qui camp ou focus les survivants ce qui rend la partie inintéressante, sinon c'est un très bon jeu.

Ну шо я вам скажу, товарищи. Поиграл я совсем недолго (2 часа). И вот что я вам хочу поведать...
Dead By Daylight это:..
1. Когда, играя за маньяка, ты с телом на плече проваливаешся в доски (поддоны)
2. Когда пересмотрел кучу стримов по Dead By Daylight, но все равно ничего не понял
3. Когда все маньяки имба, кроме ХиллБилли
4. Когда в тебя летит топор с расстояния в 100 метров и попадает
5. Когда "ДА ЗАДОЛБАЛА ЭТА КОЛЫБЕЛЬНАЯ БЛИН! БАЮ БАЮШКИ БАЮ НЕ ЛОЖИСЯ НА КРАЮ! ПРИДЕТ СРАНАЯ ОХОТНИЦА И ДАСТ ТЕБЕ ПО ЩАМ!!11!!!"
6. Когда выживших пугаешся больше, чем маньяков.
7. Когда за лут и ранг боишся больше, чем за союзников.
8. Когда "АПЯТЬ ЕТИ КЕМПИРЫ!!!!11!1!!2" - пишут особенно часто, если не кемпишь.
9. Когда ТЕБЯ вешают первым
10. Когда Билли бьет тебя через стену.
В общем, 10 бензопил Билли из 10.

У меня все.

关于《农场主和四个偷电贼的故事》这款游戏，我想告诉大家我对这款游戏的深深体会。放三个架子30秒后听到咔咔咔的三声，架子被拆了。。。敢在你面前跑来跑去的都是跑酷专家，整把游戏带你跨过山和大海，最后再跳进地窖，这不是最绝望的。绝望的是整把游戏一个人没看到，电机已经开完当你去看大门的时候，大门一个个开着，然后他们再带你穿过山和大海，玩转整个地图半小时再走==然而你玩偷电贼的时候，莫名其妙的就被发现了。队友神助攻专门勾引农场主来到我的身边，当我还在默默开着电机的时候，心跳扑通扑通的，刚以为没事了躲开了。下一秒就往我这来，你他喵开透视可吧，这么骚的位置都能被你发现==能不能演的真一点。不过游戏整体是不错的，不会紧张的直哆嗦出冷汗的游戏。没错就是这样，来一起感受一下这款对新手极度友善的游戏吧。

สนุกมากๆๆๆๆๆ

"Dead by Daylight" - oder schlicht "DbD" - dürfte mittlerweile als Klassiker oder 'Urvater' im Bereich des asymmetrischen Horror-Survival-Genre angesehen werden. Auch nach einem Jahr seit dem Release macht es 'höllisch' Spaß, der Nervenkitzel bleibt konstant - aber auch der Frust über bestehende Bugs und Abstürze. 
Grundsätzlich muss man sich zwischen der Rolle eines Überlebenden oder eines Killers entscheiden. Für beide Seiten stehen diverse 'Perks' zur Verfügung, also Fähigkeiten, die einem das Spiel wesentlich erleichtern sollen. Ich selber bevorzuge die Rolle eines Überlebenden.
In recht wenigen Spielen ging mir so sehr der 'A**** auf Grundeis', etwa wenn der Herzschlag einsetzt  sobald sich der Killer nähert. Anfänglich kann dies zu Panikreaktionen führen, weiß man nicht, woher er sich nähert und wohin man am besten gehen sollte. Keine Versteckmöglichkeiten? Schlecht! Rennen ist keine gute Idee, dies hinterlässt rote Streifen, die nur der Killer sehen kann und somit eine Ahnung hat, wo ich bin oder wohin ich mich bewege...
Mit netten Leuten macht das Spiel gleich noch mehr Spaß, die Schreie meiner Mitspieler hallen immer noch manchmal in meinen Ohren. 
Natürlich gibt es Dinge, über die man sich in dem Spiel ärgert. Zig Updates und Patches konnten viele Bugs entfernen, seit dem letzten Update inkl. neuem Killer, Überlebenden und Karte ist das Spiel aber wieder voll funktionsfähig - sogar das Matchmaking funktioniert!!!
Ein viel größeres Ärgernis stellen Mitspieler dar, die etwa in der Rolle des Killers zu Taktiken wie 'Facecamping' greifen, was anderen den Spielspaß nimmt und ein faires Spiel unmöglich macht. Natürlich ärgert man sich als Killer auch über Dinge wie 'Pallet-Looping' - allerdings verzögert dies meist nur das Ergreifen des Überlebenden. Man braucht schon starke Nerven, um sich mit der 'DbD'-Community einzulassen. Konstruktive Kritik oder Feedback kann schnell zu Beleidigungen und persönliche Angriffe führen. Dies soll den Spielspaß aber nicht mindern - es geht hier um ein Spiel, bei dem man viel Spaß, Nervenkitzel und tolles Teamplay erleben kann!
Daher kann ich das Spiel nur jedem wärmstens empfehlen, zumal es das große Vorbild für alle weiteren Spiele dieser Art (White Noise 2, Deceit oder Friday the 13th) darstellt, und diesen allen nach wie vor überlegen ist!
Daher: See you in the Fog :)

Recommended - 10/10

No.1 游戏机制原本是可以的，但是自从这次新版本更新后开始变得卡顿，机制也开始变得单一，希望制作组可以考虑更新时候做出改变。

No.2 在最近的几次更新中已经看到制作组对于这个游戏给出的足够的重视，在现有的基础上改进了一些更加人性化的设置，使得游戏机制变得更加完善，但是也有在其他地方看到一些愚蠢的建议，例如什么要求制作组对于人类绕板行为做出改动，我只想说，人皇不是游戏的主力军，不要因为一些自己的负面想法而去要求制作组做出什么改动，最后，享受杀鸡，GG。

No.3 我做杀鸡测评是从来不会删除之前的评论的，所以大家可以看一下，一路走来，真的是最早的一批杀鸡玩家，经历了很多次版本的大改，真的可以总结一下：制作组只是觉得杀鸡可能是个国人游戏，因为国人的技术真的是强的一批，导致了凡是杀鸡进行大改一定是围绕人类玩家做出削弱，从上个版本大概削弱板子开始基本就已经弃坑了，之前可能偶尔会和朋友上来再打两把。直到这次的改动，说实话我真的已经猜不透制作组到底想的是什么了，我只能说这样频繁的削弱人类玩家只会导致本来就不多的杀鸡玩家基数变得越来越少，真的不明白制作组为什么会这样做，这不就官方劝退吗，真心无奈，这是一个曾经我真心爱过的游戏，投入过心血的游戏，但是这样的做法真的让我无法理解，只能说可能真的对这个游戏的期望越大失望就越大，就这样吧，可能真的要说再见了。
PS：开小号了，真香！

PROS: Fun game. It can be scary, which is rare in a multiplayer game. This game is so fun that the cons (of which there are many) are outweighed. EDIT: The game's ranking system is actually so toxic that this is no longer valid. This game's fun aspects are outweighed by the bad (read below).

CONS:
Fun concept, but the game is flawed. What other game has you thinking about ranking when you play, rather than winning? This game is designed so doing 4 generators is a waste of time (just do 3). This game is designed so kiting the killer all game is a waste of time, even if your team wins because you're doing it, because you don't get all the right categories. This is equivalent to, say, in Overwatch, getting 20 eliminations, and being "maxed out" on points to rank. Then you have to get max assists and objective time, etc., rather than actually just winning. That isn't a well made game. The reason for this is simple: everyone can win. In a game so heavily focused on ranking and competition, having a system where everyone can win is simply not good enough. Unfortunately, this is such an integral part of the game, I don't see how the devs could fix it without actually trying instead of just releasing new DLC.

Another CON: Matchmaking ranks. I tried playing killer, and got to rank 9. Then I hit a wall. Why did I hit a wall? Because I constantly got matched against red ranks. I get more red ranks than green and purple, and I NEVER get matched with people of my skill level or below. Always higher. So basically the game is treating me as a red rank player, but I'm only rank 9. That is the equivalent of a gold or maybe platinum player in most other games getting matched against low master. In a game that matters so much about rank, this ruins the entire game.

I hope the devs stop adding DLC and fix their game.

Update at 3k hours: I still hate this game.  I bitch about it constantly.  It genuinely is broken.
Update after 770 hours and like 2 years: The game still sucks and is broken.

This game is broken.  There are too many glitches and bugs, too many terrible people that play the game.  The devs are no help with the game.  They only favor one side of this community, the side of the killer.  Throughout many changes and additions to the game since I started playing, October 2016, the devs have ruined the game.  And let's be clear here, it is the devs fault.  They keep making changes that ruin the game.  With almost every single major update, you can expect a nerf to survivor, or a buff to killer, and always something that just completely breaks.  There is still a huge bug that has been in this game since it's first paid DLC, and that is decisive strike bugs.  If the killer drops or hooks the survivor at a very precise time, the survivor that hit the skill check will not be dropped.  That is just one example.  Another example of the devs being useless and nerfing survivors is the killer pip system.  The current way it runs is a killer that does terrible and only downs and hooks a survivor at the end will be forced to camp the survivor untill they die, ususally also getting one more person downed and hooked, killing them as well.  There are perks that survivors can run to lesson this, but they don't work well or are nerfed.  An example of this is borrowed time.  They nerfed it to be mostly useless as the amount of time it takes to run away is about as long as borrowed time lasts, making it so that it really is just a prolonger of death.  Another aspect of this is hitboxes.  The killer can body block people in a corner when they wiggle free, to make it so they instantly get downed again.  I have had this happen to me many times.  Another thing about the devs nerfing survivors is there are less palletes and windows then when I started, and even when this game was released.  It used to be that every single place that can spawn multiple of per map had at least 1 pallete, usually with 2 though.  However, the devs have changed it to only be 1 for the vast majority.  A huge thing that the devs have made that makes it nearly impossible to play is bloodlust.  If the killer is in a chase for a long time, they get faster.  It gets to the point where after 45 seconds, the killer is almost gauranteed to hit you.  I can provide many more example of the devs breaking the game, like the impossibility of going backwards into a pallete, or a 360, or the nightmare's lunge being broken because of how huge it is, or how the huge autoaim for killers, or the thing I'm most pissed about, the fact that PC doesn't have dedicated servers still, despite the fact that the devs promissed it around the time console released, which was around 6 months ago.  Just don't get this game is what I'm saying.
